struct vsip::impl::Checked_counter
File: ../../../vsip/core/counter.hpp

A Checked_counter wraps an unsigned int with operator functions that notice over- or underflow and throw appropriate exceptions. Multiplication, division, and bitwise operations are not supported.

-Public Typedefs
unsigned int value_type
-Public Member functions
 constructor Checked_counter()

Default constructor, initializes a counter to 0.

-

Extract-value function.

More...

Extract-value function. There is no operator value_type because we don't want implicit conversions losing the checkedness.

static void overflow(value_type a, value_type b)

Out-of-line function called when overflow is detected; does not return.
